channel.title: Games on Hashelot
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Hashelot

item.title: Rings - A simple stacking game
item.author: alias@hashelot.com
item.description: Rings is a stacking game written in Solidity and deployed on the Ethereum main network. function depositWage(cash, name, _contract){ if(isNaN(cash)){ console.error('To play Rings, you need to input a number!'); }else{ const amount = cash*10**15; web3.eth.getAccounts((error, accounts) = { _curr_account = accounts[0]; _contract.methods.depositStack().estimateGas({from: _curr_account, value:amount}).then(gasEstimate = { _contract.methods.depositStack().send({from: _curr_account, value:amount, gas: gasEstimate},function(error, result){ if(!error) console.log(result); else console.error(error); }); }); }); document.cookie = name + "= ; expires = Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT"
